thread.title: Mohamed H
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Mohamed H

author: Mohamed H
title: Mohamed H
text: The serviceman were at my door within a 30 minute period. They were very quick in setting everything up. My only problem was that the salesman didn't tell me something was out of stock when I ordered it and so I'll have to wait another week for the rest of my order.
